description.displayText: Jan is reliable, and responsible. She takes her responsibilities seriously and has never caused a concern in any task she was assigned. Jana displays personality traits, which make her presence always warm and welcome.  She is honest, courteous, loyal, sensitive and is a pleasure to work with.  I recommend Jana very highly and I am confident that she is going to provide exceptional  caregiver. Jana has been a lifesaver when it came to care and companion for my mother.
